item.description:
Spread warmth and merriment during one of the coldest times of the year. Join us as we joyfully carol through historic streets surrounded by classic Victorian architecture in Providence's Armory District.

Annually, the Sunday before Christmas!

Meet up at Loie Fuller's restaurant (1455 Westminster St) from 5-6pm before heading out at 6pm to bring holiday cheer to the neighborhood through festive songs. We have planned stops with neighbors along the way for warm drinks and bathroom breaks before circling around to end at 8pm for milk & cookies at Leadership Rhode Island headquarters (1570 Westminster) -- one block from Loie Fuller's, our original starting point.

EVERYONE'S WELCOME regardless of religious or non-religious beliefs

This free festive event is sponsored by Connect Providence, Kidoinfo.com, Leadership Rhode Island, Loie Fuller's, the West Broadway Neighborhood Association (WBNA), and WestSide Stories.
item.name: West Side Christmas Caroling
